attributes.action: Do something about catalytic converter theft
attributes.additional_details: It is plighting the lives of so many people. People are either a victim or scared to be next one and feel powerless and defenceless
attributes.background: Discuss and come up with real measures to combat and prevent the rising catalytic converter theft. Government is almost doing nothing about it as it stands. Police forces just record it for record keeping and thieves are just getting more and more fearless about it

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575859
